resources.string: Application developed by Miguel Ángel Martínez Ramírez. Version 1.0.
The character that has been selected is
Welcome to the world of Mario.
The main hero of the Mushroom Kingdom. Mario is very positive and always cheerful.
Mario\'s younger brother. He is tall, slim, and often timid, but always willing to help.
Ability to jump higher than Mario
The princess of the Mushroom Kingdom. She is always Bowser\'s target but is brave and capable of defending herself.
Ability to float briefly in the air
A loyal servant of Princess Peach. He is small, cheerful, and always ready to help.
The main antagonist of the series and king of the Koopas. He always tries to capture Princess Peach.
A loyal friend of Mario. He is a green dinosaur with special abilities like eating enemies and throwing eggs.
Ability to perform a prolonged jump
The princess of Sarasaland. She is a friend of Peach and has an energetic and brave personality.
Ability to float briefly in the air
A rival of Mario, known for his greed. He is strong and always seeks gold and wealth.
Luigi\'s companion and rival, known for his malicious and sneaky character.
The guardian of the cosmos, protector of stars and Lumas. She is wise and powerful.
Bowser\'s son, who also tries to capture Princess Peach. He is clever and follows in his father\'s footsteps.
Ability to use the magic brush
A shy and playful ghost. He is known for being easily frightened and often appears in dark places.
The powerful gorilla who is Mario\'s friend. He is strong and protective of his jungle home.
Donkey Kong\'s nephew, agile and fast, always ready to help his family and friends.
Ability to fly with his jetpack
